bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of shui zhong 水腫 , water swelling, disease with the body being swollen and turning yellow, a deep movement in the vessels, and anuria. Jin gui yao lue 金匱要略 Mj: 裏水 者，一身面目黃腫，其脈沉，小便不利 , “In the case of internal water , the complete body, including the face and eyes, is yellow and swollen. The [movement in the] vessels is in the depth, and urine cannot be passed freely”.
